name: Copper Platform
highlight: A platform for open, transparent, and user-friendly participation in Liquidity Bootstrapping Pools.
summary: Copper is an open, transparent, and user-friendly platform for interacting with Liquidity Bootstrapping Pools (LBP), an innovative method that allows the market to determine the fair price of a token. Copper's key features enable price discovery, permissionless participation, fair distribution, capital efficiency, while also preventing sniper bots or whales from dominating an LBP. No gas wars, no whitelists, no allocation games.
